body:
Caleb Autistic Real

-layerslayerslayerslayerslayers

-very much resistant to/uncomfy with change seeing how he didnt really like various people trying to fix his clothes/offering to get him new ones

-frumkin is both the ultimate comfort object and a stim toy and as seen in the most recent episode(i think we’re at 42 now?)he infodumps about frumpkin and cats in general

-infodumping generally on that matter. Get him started on books or magic (or cats) and he wont stop until someone tells him to stfu

-trouble with tone and jokes sometimes, as well as a relatively monotone voice

-trouble socializing and discomfort with contact

-SOMETIMES SOMETHING COOL HAPPENS AND LIAM DOES THE FLAPPY HANDS AND UHHH AUTISTIC CALEB REAL

-blunt, not very good at knowing what is and isnt proper to say, especially early in the campaign

-comes off as incredibly awkward in a lot of social circumstances too, just phrasing things weird or acting in a non-typical way

-when he paced around for 10 minutes to make the dome for the first time and then he went “HEY GUYS LOOK WHAT I MADE” and was so excited about it

-when they went to the ocean and caleb went as far out as he could and then just layed there with his ears covered staring at the sky. Speaking from experience this is sensory heaven.

-l a y e r s

-stims!!! Liam often mentions caleb twiddling with things absentmindedly as other stuff happens.

In conclusion: caleb autistic real

summary: What sexuality do you HC Caleb is?
question: What sexuality do you HC Caleb is?
answer:
Huh, you know, this ask made me think about it, because I honestly haven’t been.

I think where I’m at with it is that Caleb isn’t really thinking about that right now, and might not know or have really thought about what his sexual orientation is. He lost a lot of his young-adult years, and therefore lost a lot of time to develop that part of his identity. The last time Caleb thought about his sexuality was probably before the asylum, when he was 16 years old. I know I don’t identify now the same way I did when I was 16. And post-asylum Caleb I think genuinely just hasn’t had the desire or brain space to spend time thinking about it.

We know that he’s expressed an objective assessment of attractiveness about individual men and women (Fjord, Molly and Yasha, and Ophelia Mardune come to mind, but all of these were sort of detached, impersonal observations). We know he probably had some kind of a deep relationship with Astrid when he was younger, but we know comparatively less about his relationship with Eodwulf. Nott, the person who knows him best, is unsure what his sexuality is.

Tl;dr, my headcanon is that Caleb himself does not currently know or care about the answer to this question. We might find out with him along the way.

I'm Devi and this is my blog for nerding out. Most common atm are NANA & Critical Role. And much more! 
Feel free to send me asks about anything fandom related. I enjoys prompts and questions.  My blog is mostly on queue, except for original posts, so if I seem active and not answering your ask - don't worry, I'll get to you asap.she/her

summary: And the notts throwing the wildest parties for the m9 special days.
question: And the notts throwing the wildest parties for the m9 special days.
answer:
Shoot, sorry I didn’t catch these when you sent them.

But the Nott Army throws that absolute wildest parties for sure Molly and Jester probably have the most fun.  As long as the party is only the M9 and the Nott Army, Caleb and Yasha don’t actually feel that uncomfortable at the party, no matter how raucous.  Caduceus on the other hand… He isn’t a happy boy.

Because when the nott planet gets established I wonder what would happen to the old goblins especially the males.

Hmmm, I think it’d be more of a re-education of a kinder society for the goblins.  Any goblins that refused to accept the new order to Goblin culture would be killed in revolts, but I think at least young goblins would happily accept a kinder way of living and I don’t think Goblin society would ever become just the Nott’s, even as it became Nott Planet.

blog.name: criticalfic
blog.title: Critical Role fic recs
blog.description: A Critical Role fic rec blog. Submissions/requests/suggestions very welcome as I get this up and running!

tags: other M9 characters but those are the most prominent
title: Starbright
body:
Starbright by distractedKat (5,499 words)

Campaign 2 AU. This AU is based on Stardust, by Neil Gaiman, although I don’t think you need to know anything about that book or movie to understand and enjoy this fic. I love Stardust, and I love AUs that take aspects of canon characters and use them to fit other concepts onto them. Caleb as a fallen star is, I think, an amazing idea, and this story uses it delightfully. Nott and Caleb’s relationship really shines through here (sorry) and the bond the rest of the Mighty Nein have with them is clear and wonderful.
